subtitle: Tasty little cookies that are good for the lunchbox, a picnic or afternoon tea.

method.text: Cream the butter (or margarine) and sugar until soft and light. Add the flour, then the pecan nuts and cherries.
Knead thoroughly and roll into balls. Place on lightly greased baking trays allowing plenty of room for the mixture to spread.
Press the pecan halves into the centre of each cookie.
Bake in the oven for 15 min. Allow to cool on the baking sheets until cold. Store in an airtight container.

title: Pecan and cherry cookies
